name: Fill The Holes
description:
This is a little idle/clicker game I made for Brackeys Game Jam 2020.1 . Its my second game and my first solo-developed game. The theme was simple : "Holes". The "story" when you want to call it like that, is simple : fill holes = earn money ! It was fun and exciting experimenting with the different UI elements from the Unity engine as well as my first try at the save/load system. I hope you have fun trying the game out. If you find bugs or have ideas how i could improve my project feel free to write it in the comments.

---------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------

Filling a hole is simple : click the button in the middle as fast as you can and buy upgrades for your machines that produce matter even if you are not clicking.

---------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------

When a hole is filled you move to a random location that has a random house and a random person.

---------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------

The matter you need to fill a hole increases the more holes you have filled ( every 8 holes)

---------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------

The effectivity of the generators increases at lvl. 20 and at lvl.50

---------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
